ygData.subject: Re: Sell That Lung
ygData.msgSnippet: I would seem to me that a depleted aqualung could still be used to make a rebreather...Sell aqualung for 1000pp, buy back empty for 100 or 200pp, make a
ygData.messageBody:
I would seem to me that a depleted aqualung could still be used to make a
rebreather...Sell aqualung for 1000pp, buy back empty for 100 or 200pp,
make a rebreather from it and sell for 2000pp

At 05:16 PM 11/15/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Y0URG00FY@...
>
>Hail Fellow Gnomes....
>
>I had a thought..... perhaps those being supported by their Guild can check
>this out - aqua lung used.... all charges gone.... how much does a HIGH
>charisma charchter get offered from a Merchant? Ineteresting to know whether
>thats less than a Merchant offers for a charged one. It may not be very
>much... but intersting to find out and as far as marketing goes a good sale
>point 'you get x hundred plat back on selling to merchant....'
